basicInfo.desc: This Task provides the ability to search MicroStrategy Metadata. Includes the ability to perform incremental fetch.

parameter.name: styleName
parameter.desc: The style to use to transform the FolderBean.

parameter.name: blockBegin
parameter.desc: The index (starting at 1) of the first element to begin browsing. If omitted, then the first element is chosen.

parameter.name: blockCount
parameter.desc: The number of elements to return in this fetch. If omitted, then all remaining elements are returned.

parameter.name: sortKey
parameter.desc: How the elements of the folder are sorted. Sort keys are specified as integers, as described by the EnumWebObjectSort interface. If omitted, then WebObjectSortObjectNameFoldersFirst is used ('6') is used.

parameter.name: asc
parameter.desc: Whether elements of the list are sorted in ascending order or not. Values are either 'true' or 'false'. If omitted, then 'true' is assumed.

parameter.name: searchID
parameter.desc: Specifies the ID of the search to use.

parameter.name: searchPattern
parameter.desc: Specifies the text that the name should include in the search.

parameter.name: nameWildcards
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the search will include wildcards.

parameter.name: rootFolderID
parameter.desc: Specifies the ID of the root folder.

parameter.name: rootFolderType
parameter.desc: Specifies the type of the root folder.

parameter.name: objectType
parameter.desc: Specifies the types of the objects to search within the list of validObjectTypes.

parameter.name: dateType
parameter.desc: Specifies if the search should be restricted based on the date.

parameter.name: dateSubType
parameter.desc: Specifies if the search should be restricted based on dates on a time or date interval.

parameter.name: created
parameter.desc: Specifies if the search should be restricted based on dates taken from the creation time.

parameter.name: intervalUnit
parameter.desc: Specifies the time units when a search is restricted based on a time interval.

parameter.name: intervalValue
parameter.desc: Specifies the time value when a search is restricted based on a time interval.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.desc: Specifies the starting date when a search is restricted based on a date interval.

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.desc: Specifies the ending date when a search is restricted based on a date interval.

parameter.name: ownerType
parameter.desc: Specifies the owner of the object to search.

parameter.name: description
parameter.desc: Specifies to restrict the search based on some text found in the description.

parameter.name: maxObjects
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the search should return a maximum number of objects.

parameter.name: recursive
parameter.desc: Specifies whether to recurse into the subfolders during a search operation. Set argument to 1 to enable recursion.

parameter.name: searchDomain
parameter.desc: Specifies an integer value for the search domain. It defaults to com.microstrategy.webapi.EnumDSSXMLSearchDomain #DssXmlSearchDomainProject.

parameter.name: folderBrowserStyle
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the search should perform in a folder browsing style. In folder browsing style, the subfolders in current root folder will be automatically added as search result when the search has a root and not recursive.

parameter.name: includeAncestorInfo
parameter.desc: Specifies whether the Block should include ancestor information.

parameter.name: dataSourcesXML
parameter.desc: Specifies the data sources xml to be used by the search

parameter.name: includeObjectDesc
parameter.desc: Indicates whether it is need to output object description.

parameter.name: folderLinksContextId
parameter.desc: Specifies the context id associated with the folder links that appear on the ancestor list.

parameter.name: quickSearch
parameter.desc: Specifies whether to use New Search Engine.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.desc: Specifies what fields to search - name, description or comment.

parameter.name: validObjectTypes
parameter.desc: What subtype of objects we want to limit the output to. A comma-separated list of values from EnumDSSXMLObjectSubTypes. This parameter can only be modified via the searchMetadata.xml file.

parameter.name: showObjectTags
parameter.desc: Indicates whether we need to provide object tags

parameter.name: uses
parameter.desc: Specifies the object info to be used to search dependent. Format: did:type

parameter.name: includeHiddenAncestors
parameter.desc: Hidden ancestor should be included
